Constraints & cues: The user has multiple meross-Light-Strip devices in the living room, with specific settings for brightness and color that can be adjusted to achieve a "redonkulous" look. The first device is currently set to 70% brightness with a saturated color, while the third device is at 35% brightness with the same saturated color.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding which specific lighting effects or colors the user wants to apply to achieve the desired look; further clarification on color preferences or specific adjustments is needed to avoid misinterpretation.
environment_overview:
1) 检测到的设备及位置：在客厅中有多个 meross-Light-Strip 设备。第一个设备（ID: 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298）具备开关、亮度调节、色温和颜色控制的能力，当前状态为亮度70，颜色饱和度100，颜色值为1。第二个设备（ID: 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709）同样具备上述能力，但当前未设置颜色和饱和度，亮度为48。第三个设备（ID: 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d）也具备相同能力，当前状态为亮度35，颜色饱和度100，颜色值为1。

2) 当前状态及控制提示：第一个设备处于开启状态，亮度为70，颜色为饱和的颜色1。第二个设备未开启颜色和饱和度，亮度为48。第三个设备同样开启，亮度为35，颜色为饱和的颜色1。为了实现用户的命令“让客厅看起来很炫”，可以通过控制第一个和第三个设备的颜色和亮度来达到效果。
